channel.title: Can't buy items from ALL point shops [PI]
channel.description:
This includes slayerPoints, votePoints, pcPoints, donatorPoints!
When i go to open the store I can check the price, and it will show the value in the right currency. But even if i have a sufficient amount of points when i go to buy the item, it does not appear in my inventory and i do not loose any points. What am i doing wrong?

item.title: Can't buy items from ALL point shops [PI]
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:5, topic:555242”][quote author=matzie link=topic=674168.msg4508084#msg4508084 date=1462527416]

have you tried it with sufficient coins in your inventory? Did you modify the buy handlers as well?

Why do you need coins at a point shop?

@OP:

Show us the buy method… along with telling us what shop ids are point shops

Depending on the system, probably defaults to item 995, coins. So if the shop wasn’t configured to use the points, it would use currency. derp O_o
[/quote]
Which in itself would still classify as a bug[/quote]
I was curious to determine if that is what is happening. Could of replaced the MenuInteractionItemOption1(Value item) to support the shop but missed the actual buy methods as well.

Read full topic
item.source: Can't buy items from ALL point shops [PI]
